name: 1000 ways to dice
description:
You are an adventurer dice set on discovering the world, with only luck by your side.

This is a rogue-like card-game, in which you roll your "stats" at the start of each turn using a slot machine, affecting the power of your cards. At the end of each combat choose between 2 sets of cards and "stats" to add to your deck and slot machine, to increase your chances of survival.

Follow the map, encountering 5 different enemies, each stronger than the one before, ultimating in fighting Death Itself.

Go on a journey, and build your chances to victory!

Instructions

  • Left click on doors to initiate combat
  • Click on cards (bottom) to play them
  • At the end of combat choose a reward

Known issues

  • When choosing a card or stat to remove from your deck, you have to click twice.
